test-case.name: missingThingIdProperty
test-case.description: Tests missing thing id property in message. This message should forwarded to the deadletter queue

test-case.description: Tests invalid empty message content. This message should forwarded to the deadletter queue

test-case.description: Tests register target

test-case.name: receiveDownLoadAndInstallMessageAfterAssignment
test-case.description: Verfiy receiving a download and install message if a deployment is done before the target has polled the first time.

test-case.description: Tests null topic message header. This message should forwarded to the deadletter queue

test-case.description: Register a target and send a valid update action status (cancel_rejected). Verfiy if the updated action status is correct.

test-case.description: Tests not allowed content-type in message. This message should forwarded to the deadletter queue

test-case.description: Tests tenant not exist. This message should forwarded to the deadletter queue

test-case.description: Verfiy receiving a cancel update message if a deployment is canceled before the target has polled the first time.

test-case.description: Register a target and send a invalid update action status (canceled). The current status (pending) is not a canceling state. This message should forwarded to the deadletter queue
